About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your project is in safe hands

Well i'm Chime Justice Chime. I am 18years old. I'm a frontend developer living in Port-Harcourt, Nigeria, specializing in web development and open source.

I am highly proficient in CSS, SASS and a little knowledge of JavaScript. I am currently working on improving my JavaScript skills by building various projects to enhance my abilities.

Technologies and tools I'm currently exploring and interested about.
